Class PlayArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.PlayArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PlayArea
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    play area is a place for players to put a lake tile and draw dedication tokens
    Author:
    none
